item.title: My First Post
item.description: What is this all about? I am Jiri Knesl, CEO of Flexiana, lifelong learner, reader, traveler. On this website, I will show my work, life and thoughts. I am mostly interested in: Agility New Digital Products Service Design & Service implementation Software Craftsmanship Clojure Change management How to learn fast & remember longer And besides that, I am interested in variety of topics including economics, simulations, political philosophy, etc.
